issue.title: [Gandiva] [Java] Build platform independent JAR package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3386](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3386). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we only package .so for the gandiva jar, we would need a packaged lib for windows and mac.
